dir.commands: declare @$recordHasBeenChanged nvarchar(4000) select @$recordHasBeenChanged = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Mẫu báo cáo %s đã được xóa.' else N'Report form %s has been deleted.' end declare @defaultForm varchar(33), @reportType char(1) select @reportType = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_kieu_bc' select top 1 @defaultForm = rtrim(upper(form)) from @@table where ma_maubc = '&defaultTable;' and (kieu_bc = 0 or kieu_bc = @reportType) and nd_yn = 1 if @defaultForm is null select top 1 @defaultForm = rtrim(upper(form)) from @@table where ma_maubc = '&defaultTable;' and (kieu_bc = 0 or kieu_bc = @reportType) select 'this._ten=''' + replace(replace(ten_maubc, '\', '\\'), '''', '\''') + ''';this._ten2=''' + replace(replace(ten_maubc2, '\', '\\'), '''', '\''') + '''; this._defaultForm = ''' + @defaultForm + '''; loadFormFilter(this);' as message from @@table where form = @defaultForm &XMLWhenFilterClosing; if @$loai = 3 begin if @$xoa_yn = 1 and exists(select 1 from v20dmmaubc where form = @form and ma_maubc = @ma_maubc and loai_maubc = 0) begin delete v20dmmaubc where form = @form and ma_maubc = @ma_maubc delete &defaultTable; where ma_maubc = @form select 'form' as field, case when @@language = 'V' then N'Mẫu TT/QĐ đã được xóa.' else 'Data has been deleted successfully.' end as message return end else begin select 'form' as field, case when @@language = 'V' then N'Không thể xóa mẫu TT/QĐ. Mẫu đã bị xóa hoặc đây là mẫu chuẩn hoặc chưa xác nhận thông tin cần xóa.' else 'Cannot delele this template. You have not confirmed yet or invalid report form.' end as message return end end if not exists (select 1 from v20dmmaubc where ma_maubc = @ma_maubc and form = @form) begin select 'form' as field, replace(@$recordHasBeenChanged, '%s', rtrim(case when @@language ='V' then @ten_maubc else @ten_maubc2 end)) as message return end if @$loai = 2 begin update v20dmmaubc set ten_maubc = @ten_maubc, ten_maubc2 = @ten_maubc2 where ma_maubc = @ma_maubc and form = @form end if @$loai = 1 begin declare @max int, @f varchar(64) set @max = 65 while @max < 90 begin select @f = left(@form, len(rtrim(@form)) - 1) + char(@max) if exists(select 1 from v20dmmaubc where ma_maubc = @ma_maubc and form = @f) set @max = @max + 1 else break end select @f = left(@form, len(rtrim(@form)) - 1) + char(@max) if exists (select 1 from v20dmmaubc where ma_maubc = @ma_maubc and form = @f) begin select 'loai' as field, case when @@language = 'V' then N'Không thể tạo mẫu TT/QĐ.' else 'Cannot create this template.' end as message, 'recoverForm$Data(this);' as script return end insert into v20dmmaubc(ma_maubc, form, ten_maubc, ten_maubc2, title, title2, h_line1, h_line12, h_line2, h_line22, h_line3, h_line32, h_line4, h_line42, h_line5, h_line52, loai_maubc, kieu_bc, nd_yn, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2, ma_td1, ma_td2, ma_td3, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, ngay_td1, ngay_td2, ngay_td3, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, s6, s7, s8, s9) values (@ma_maubc, @f, @ten_maubc, @ten_maubc2, upper(@ten_maubc), upper(@ten_maubc2), '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', 0, 0, 0, null, null, 0, 0, '', '', '', 0, 0, 0, null, null, null, '', '', '', '', '', '', 0, 0, 0, null, null, null) select * into #t from &defaultTable; where ma_maubc = @form update #t set ma_maubc = @f insert into &defaultTable; select * from #t drop table #t select '' as field, '' as message, 'before$LoadGridReportForm(this, ''' + @f + ''');recoverForm$Data(this);' as script end if @$loai = 9 begin update reports set cname = b.ten, cname2 = b.ten2 from reports a join dmmausoct b on a.ccode = b.ccode and b.ma_maubc = @form and a.ccode like 'DEC%' select 'form' as field, case when @@language = 'V' then N'Mẫu TT/QĐ đã được cập nhật.' else 'Data has been applied successfully.' end as message return end

action.text: if exists(select 1 from v20dmmaubc where form = @form) begin select ten_maubc, ten_maubc2 from v20dmmaubc where form = @form return end
